# Regression in R

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
data <- wooldridge::hprice1 %>% 
  summarize(
    preis = price * 1000, 
    wohnflaeche = sqrft * 0.09290304, 
    schlafzimmer = bdrms,
    grundstueck = lotsize * 0.09290304
  )
```

```{r}
str(data)
```

```{r}
formula <- preis ~ wohnflaeche + I(schlafzimmer > 4) + grundstueck
```

```{r}
model <- lm(formula = formula, data = data)
```

```{r}
summary(model)
```
